column7: Examines systems of production and exchange in Africa. Through lectures, discussions, readings and films participants will study the ways African people interact in local markets and the impact of national and international markets on their welfare. Same as AFST 254.
column10: Cultural Studies - Non-West, and Social & Beh Sci - Soc Sci course.
column11: The course meets twice a week for 1:20 minutes each time.
